text: Marwari is a dialect of Rajasthani language spoken in Rajasthan, India. It is also spoken in Pakistan primarily Sindh. It has 70 million speakers. It is spoken by the Marwari Rajasthani people. In India it is written in the Devanagari script while in Pakistan it is written in Nastalik. ==References== Category:Languages of Pakistan Category:Languages of Sindh Category:Languages of Nepal Category:Languages of India Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Marwari language
